import visualizationsObj from './visualizations.devdocs.json';

Contains the shared architecture among all the legacy visualizations, e.g. the visualization type registry or the visualization embeddable.

Contact [@elastic/kibana-visualizations](https://github.com/orgs/elastic/teams/kibana-visualizations) for questions regarding this plugin.
